summary:
I have  extensive experience in leading End to End supply chain, Customer Service and operational excellence  in industries relating to Petrochemicals, FMCG and Healthcare sectors. Over the course of my career, I have developed professional experience in regional settings across India, Middle East, Japan, Netherlands and Singapore.

Additionally, I have notable successes in full P&L, Supply chain set up, Sourcing and Strategic Procurement, Production Planning and Control.

My key functional strengths include Customer Service, Change Management, Operational Excellence (Lean and Six Sigma certified), P&L, S&OP, People Management, Production Planning and Control, Sourcing, Stakeholder Relationship Management, Strategic Leadership, Strategic Procurement, Supply Chain Setup & Management, Team Supervision & Development, Detail-oriented, Ability To Work Under Pressure and Communication Abilities.

Job details:
	Ensure adherence, upgradation and execution of all supply chain related processes in all Asia + LATAM countries: S&OP, Forecast accuracy,Order management, Procurement, Logistics, Inventory management including unhealthy inventory, Perfect order delivery, Customer experience/NPS, Project management and managing total sales and Demand forecasting and Sales recognition. 
	Responsible for developing and implementing SCM transformation – Digitalization (AI/ML enabled S&OP leading to 75%+ forecast accuracy, scaling up D2B/D2C platforms, IWD transformation (Lighthouse concept)), S&OP excellence and perfect order delivery while creating end to end order visibility. Also working on creating end 2 end org redesign (Reskill and upskill) which will help us better customer focused while bringing SCM at forefront and as engine of the organization.
	Member of International markets and Global Supply chain leadership team.
	Accountable for managing and influencing stakeholders – Sales leaders, Business managers, Country managers, Finance and Regulatory, Factory managers
	Closely work with CEO and CFO to manage P&L – Sales forecasting, demand forecasting and market cost of execution. 
	Mange customer along with sales team – Customer escalations, Pro active engagement 
	Development and implementation of SCM strategies across markets – S&OP excellence, Digitalization, End to end visibility, Logistics & manufacturing landscape, Project management maturity to name the few. 
	Nurture (Upskill and reskill) talent along with robust succession pipeline.', 'title': 'Vice President and Head of Supply Chain Asia and LATAM', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Singapore', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Philips', 'description': 'Managing a team of 7 direct reports (Director/Sr Manager level) and 12 indirect reports (SCM and CS lead of APAC countries), I was appointed to spearhead team constituting Customer service operations, Customer service marketing and business managers, Customer Relationship Managers, Supply Chain, Project management, Sales operations, NPIs/ new launches across different countries in the APAC region.

My remit includes being accountable for entire Service business P&L – Revenue $200m, EBIT 40%+. Additionally, I was responsible for service operations. These include Customer NPS, Customer relationship at all level, managing big accounts, Employee engagement, NPI, Remote set up and resolution, Customer response time, Regulatory and compliance, Service productivity.

Also, my responsibilities include SCM which covers S&OP, Inventory management, Distribution network, eCommerce platform, Project management and managing total sales forecasting and recognition.

I was accountable for managing Customer Service and SCM function for APAC

In my time here, we received awards and commendations which included Top 20 performers in International markets for Yr 2018 as well awarded lean certification for Project on Supplier Innovation in collaboration with procurement.

In this role, we successfully achieved customer NPS from 50 to 72% as well as sales forecast accuracy within +/-2% from 2017 to 2019.

In addition, we achieved an inventory reduction of 200 basis point from 2016 to 2019 for APAC as well as CAGR of 12% for Customer Service business.', 'title': 'Head - Commercial Operations and Customer Services APAC', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Singapore', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'Philips', 'description': '1.Leading a team of 4 direct reports and 6 indirect reports (Customer service lead of Asia Pacific countries), I was accountable for Service business P&L: Revenue $500m, EBIT 40%+ and Service operations ( Technical, Contact centers, Remote service, Field service, Installed base maintenance. Compliance).
